content: a round of closely stitched single_crochet sts to create a trim at the top of the vessel or work a reverse single_crochet round at the top of the vessel for added texture if you have trouble finding information on the reverse single_crochet stitch it is sometimes referred to as crab stitch once you re done stitching with mc yarn break yarn and weave in i ve been using the baskets as a yarn bowl or as a place to store small bits of wool the plates are excellent for displaying larger items share your progress/finished items on instagram with the hashtag #knitfrogrepeatdesigns for pattern support please contact the designer at knitfrogrepeat@gmail com instagram @knit_frog_repeat knit frog repeat and crochet for personal use only please note that all images text and designs are copyrighted for in person classes please be aware there are copyright/usage terms that will need to be complied with please contact me to discuss in advance thanks x © 2023 susan chin for personal use only 6 photography by knit frog repeat
